fontTheory.description: The typography system aims to balance professionalism and readability. It combines web-safe fonts for a clean and classic look suitable for a resume.
fontTheory.readability: The selected fonts prioritize readability, especially in body text, ensuring easy legibility for hiring managers or recruiters.
fontTheory.hierarchy: The typographic hierarchy is established through font weights and styles, distinguishing headings from body text for clear information organization.
fontTheory.fontPairings: Helvetica Neue is used for headings to convey a modern and clean aesthetic, while Georgia offers a traditional and elegant feel for body text, creating a harmonious balance.
